title: Bob Saget Death Records to Remain Private
sub_head: Florida judge’s ruling for permanent injunction keeps some graphic photos and police videos from being made public
body:
A Florida judge ruled Monday that certain records in the investigation of Bob Saget’s death won’t be made public, in accordance with his family’s wishes.
Ninety photos and most of the police videos pertaining to Mr. Saget’s death will remain under permanent injunction, according to the decision from Ninth Judicial Circuit Court Judge Vincent Chiu.
